text: Goniothalamus macrocalyx is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Vietnam. ==References== * Ban, N.T. 1998. Goniothalamus macrocalyx. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. macrocalyx Category:Endemic flora of Vietnam Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Nguyên Tiên Bân
title: Goniothalamus macrocalyx
